name: Barclays PLC
description: Barclays PLC is a British multinational investment bank and financial services company headquartered in London, England. Founded in 1690, Barclays has a rich history and has established itself as a leading financial institution with a global presence. The company operates through two main divisions: Barclays UK and Barclays International. Barclays UK provides personal banking, business banking, and wealth management services to customers, while Barclays International focuses on corporate and investment banking, offering services such as investment banking, risk management, and advisory services. With a commitment to innovation, Barclays has embraced digital transformation, continually enhancing its products and services to meet the evolving needs of clients. The bank is also dedicated to sustainability, striving to support the transition to a low-carbon economy through responsible investment and financing practices. As a prominent player in the global banking sector, Barclays is recognized for its strong brand, extensive expertise, and commitment to delivering value to its customers and stakeholders.

seo.meta_title: Barclays PLC | Global Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Barclays PLC, a leading global bank offering a wide range of financial services including retail banking, investment banking, and wealth management.

faq.question: What kind of services does Barclays offer?
faq.answer: Barclays offers a range of services including retail banking, investment banking, wealth management, and corporate banking.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Barclays?
faq.answer: C.S. Venkatakrishnan is the CEO of Barclays PLC.

faq.question: Where is Barclays headquartered?
faq.answer: Barclays is headquartered in London, England, UK.
